title: Develop primary and secondary verification methods
description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication so that I can have secure access to my account.
attributes_and_rules: Include both primary (username and password) and secondary (OTP via email/SMS, app-based, and biometric) verification methods.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Primary and secondary authentication methods are available.
2. User can choose between OTP, app-based, or biometric authentication.
test_cases:
Given the user has entered their username and password,
When they choose to authenticate with an OTP,
Then they should receive the OTP via email or SMS.

Given the user has entered their username and password,
When they choose to use app-based or biometric authentication,
Then the system should authenticate based on their selected method.

title: Design a responsive and cross-platform user interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive interface so that I can access the portal efficiently from any device.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure user experience consistency across desktops, tablets, and mobiles, following accessibility standards.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal is responsive and accessible.
2. User experience is consistent across devices.
test_cases:
Given a user accesses the portal from a desktop,
When they navigate through various functions,
Then the layout and interactions should be intuitive and responsive.

Given a user accesses the portal from a mobile device,
When they use the portal,
Then the interface should adapt and provide an optimized experience.

title: Create a personalized dashboard based on user profiles
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard so that I can easily access relevant banking services and information.
attributes_and_rules: Provide tailored product recommendations and shortcuts to key actions based on user profiles and real-time data.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays relevant information and services.
2. Users can configure their dashboard with custom widgets.
test_cases:
Given a logged-in user,
When they access the dashboard,
Then they should see information and services tailored to their profile.

Given user preferences,
When they configure the dashboard,
Then their settings should be saved and displayed accordingly.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable digital account opening with guided workflows
description: As a customer, I want guided workflows for new account opening so that the process is streamlined and user-friendly.
attributes_and_rules: Include form auto-fills, real-time validations, and guided steps.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can submit new account requests digitally.
2. Workflows are user-friendly and accurate.
test_cases:
Given a new customer,
When they start the account opening process,
Then the system should guide them through each step with clear instructions and validations.

Given a customer fills out the form,
When they submit the request,
Then the system should validate and process the application.

epic_title: Save and Resume Feature for Applications
title: Allow users to save incomplete applications and resume later
description: As a user, I want to save my application progress so that I can resume it later without losing data.
attributes_and_rules: Auto-save progress periodically and ensure encryption for stored partial data.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can save and resume incomplete applications.
2. Data is securely stored and retrieved.
test_cases:
Given a user is filling out an application,
When they decide to save and exit,
Then the system should securely save their progress.

Given a user returns to their dashboard,
When they resume an incomplete application,
Then their previous entries should be intact and editable.

title: Enable secure document uploads for account processes
description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely so that my personal information is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Support file format validation, encryption in transit and at rest, and version control.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can upload documents securely.
2. Documents are validated, encrypted, and stored properly.
test_cases:
Given a user needs to upload a document,
When they select a file and upload it,
Then the system should validate, encrypt, and store the document.

Given a re-upload is needed,
When a user uploads a new version,
Then the system should handle version control and replace the old file securely.

title: Provide real-time status updates and notifications
description: As a user, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time so that I am informed of the progress.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure automated notifications for submission, approval, or rejection updates.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Status updates are available in real-time.
2. Users receive notifications for key updates.
test_cases:
Given a user submits a request,
When the request status changes,
Then the system should provide real-time updates on the dashboard.

Given a user awaits request approval,
When there is a status change,
Then the system should send an automated notification.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
title: Maintain detailed interaction history and audit logs
description: As a user, I want to view my interaction history so that I can track all my activities for transparency.
attributes_and_rules: Capture all user activities and maintain logs for compliance and internal monitoring.
acceptance_criteria:
1. A detailed interaction history is available for users.
2. Audit logs are maintained for compliance.
test_cases:
Given a user logs in to the portal,
When they navigate and perform actions,
Then an interaction history should be recorded.

Given a user requests their activity history,
When they view it on the portal,
Then it should be displayed in a chronological format.

title: Integrate portal with core banking system
description: As a system user, I want real-time data synchronization with core banking so that information is always accurate.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure secure APIs and middleware for real-time data consistency.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Data synchronization with the core system is real-time and accurate.
2. Secure data exchange between the portal and core system.
test_cases:
Given a user performs an action on the portal,
When the request is submitted,
Then the action should reflect accurately in the core system.

Given data in the core banking system,
When changes occur,
Then the updated data should sync with the portal in real-time.

title: Develop and optimize an independent database
description: As a system administrator, I want a high-performance database for the portal operations so that it can handle high loads efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Implement techniques like caching, indexing, and replication for performance optimization.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Database operations are optimized for speed and reliability.
2. The system efficiently handles high loads.
test_cases:
Given the portal is under high load,
When multiple requests are processed,
Then the database should perform efficiently.

Given regular operations,
When accessing session data,
Then the system should provide quick and reliable performance.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Permissions Framework
title: Implement role-based security and access controls
description: As an admin, I want role-based access control so that sensitive data access is restricted based on authorization levels.
attributes_and_rules: Define distinct access privileges for different roles, enforcing least-privilege principles.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Access controls are implemented based on roles.
2. Users can only perform actions they are authorized for.
test_cases:
Given various user roles,
When they attempt to access data,
Then the system should ensure only authorized actions are permitted.

Given a sensitive operation,
When attempted by an unauthorized user,
Then the action should be denied and logged for review.
